fno: In the cash market, the Nifty 50 advanced 83.90 points or 0.42% to settle at 19,833.15. The NSE's India VIX, a gauge of market's expectation of volatility over the near term, jumped 0.93% to 11.60. RIL, Infosys and HDFC Bank were the top traded individual stock futures contracts in F&O segment of NSE. The July 2023 F&O contracts will expire on 27 July 2023.
